description: Vesting terms for 8,000,000 shares issued to Kash Rogers under the Founder's Stock Purchase Agreement dated August 8, 2024. The vesting schedule includes 10% immediate vesting, a 1-year cliff for 15%, and monthly vesting over 36 months for the remaining 75%.

vesting_conditions.description: 10% of the shares (800,000 shares) vest immediately upon execution of the agreement.
15% of the shares (1,200,000 shares) vest on the first anniversary of the agreement.
The remaining 75% of the shares (6,000,000 shares) vest in equal monthly installments over 36 months.
